Producer: Wes Anderson, Steven Rales, Jeremy Dawson
Screenwriter: Wes Anderson, Roman Coppola, Hugo Guinness
Production Co: American Empirical Pictures, Studio Babelsberg, Indian Paintbrush
Synopsis: THE FRENCH DISPATCH brings to life a collection of stories from the final issue of an American magazine published in a fictional 20th-century French city.
Title: The French Dispatch
